body.title: Specify which
body.elms:
```vim
:EasyAlign |       " align by 1st `|`
:EasyAlign 3 |     " align by 3rd `|`
:EasyAlign * |     " align by all `|`s
```

body.title: Add options
body.elms:
```vim
:EasyAlign * | l4r1

  l4     " lN - left_margin
  r1     " rN - right_margin
         "    spaces to the left/right of `|`
  ar     " a[lrc] - align
         "    align left/right/center
  dr     " d[lrc] - delimiter_align
         "    alignment of the delimiter itself
```

body.title: `:EasyAlign *|` (markdown tables)
body.elms:
```nohighlight
| `<Enter>` | right align                   |
| `1`       | on 1st occurrence             |
| `2`       | on 2nd occurrence (and so on) |
```

| `{Visual}` `⏎` | activate for selection |
| `ga` `{motion}` | activate for motion/text object |
{:.greycode}

Then press options (if available), then a delimiter.

body.title: Interactive mode options
body.elms:
| `⏎` | Set `alignment` |
| `<ctrl-l>` `4 ⏎` | Set `left_margin` (to the left of the delimiter) |
| `<ctrl-r>` `4 ⏎` | Set `right_margin` |
| `↓` | no margin |
{:.greycode}

body.title: Example
body.elms: - `gaip` `<ctrl-l>` `8⏎` `=` - puts 8 spaces before the equal sign
